long_description: Colorful style and sporty fun are yours with the women's Rip Curl Cosmic Watch. It combines durable water resistance, soft silicone comfort and jeweled movement for impeccable timekeeping. Silicone-covered stainless-steel case and comfortable silicone strap resist corrosion. The Rip Curl Cosmic Watch watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: Colorful style and sporty fun are yours with the women's Rip Curl Cosmic Watch. It combines durable water resistance, soft silicone comfort and jeweled movement for impeccable timekeeping.
